name: RTS?Defender!
description:
This project took me a month to realise, at the end of my 3 month course (2 weeks within the course) to learn Unity Dev.

This is a defender where you can :

  • Build differents buildings/turrets (you need to do a Power Supplier to go build further)
  • Gain gold
  • Research upgrades

It was designed to have an RTS component, but I didn't have enough time. So maybe in the future o/
Stay tuned, and enjoy!
